content.description: Shorter problem using a variety of holds staying on the right side of the boulder.
content.location: Start on the bottom right of the boulder with right on a small half moon crimp and left up above on a slippery pinch.  Work your way to the right on the sloper with 2 incuts on it and top out straight up from there.

content.description: Similar to Crook and Flail but finish up through the middle of the face and a delicate topout.
content.location: Same start as Crook and Flail in the two pockets and traverse to the right with the same holds, but instead topout through the middle of the boulder

content.description: A problem with a fun beginning sequence working through the crystal portion of the face and up through the middle of the boulder.
content.location: Start on the same bottom right holds as Spiritual Sustenance.  Work your way up into a right undercling and fire up to the large crystal shelf.  Topout from there up the middle same as Sisturn.

content.description: A fun problem using a variety of different holds and moves traversing this time right to left on the boulder.
content.location: Start on the same holds as Spiritual Sustenance and the same beginning sequence as Lapis Lazuli. This time instead of going up the middle stay right into the good pocket and fire up with a semi-large move up to the left shelf and topout left from there.

content.description: A simple traverse starting on the left side of the face working your way to the right and up through the topout.
content.location: Start on the left side of the boulder with left in a crimp pocket and right in a deep pocket.  Traverse your way through some poor feet and good holds to the right end of the boulder and up through the top.

content.description: This boulder face is a primarily crystal covered rock with some loose rock. Even though the rock is choss at certain points it offers some fun sequences and worth while problems.  As the problems get climbed more the loose rock will all come down and leave sturdy base rock behind.
